description: Collects metrics related to the user experience, including application response times and user feedback.

search_time_compare: `get_full_itsi_summary_service_health_events(da-itsi-cp-atlas-windowsuser-experience-monitoring)` [| stats count | addinfo | eval search= "earliest=" + tostring(info_min_time-(info_max_time-info_min_time))+ " latest=" + tostring(info_max_time) |fields search] | addinfo | eval bucket=if(_time<info_max_time-((info_max_time-info_min_time)/2), "last_window", "current_window") | stats avg(health_score) AS aggregate BY bucket | reverse | delta aggregate AS window_delta | search bucket=current_window | eval window_direction=if(window_delta >0, "increase", if(window_delta < 0, "decrease", "none"))
kpis.title: ServiceHealthScore

kpis.base_search: `itsi_get_index` sourcetype=perfmon OR sourcetype=WinEventLog:Application OR sourcetype=WinHostMon | eval response_time=case(sourcetype="perfmon", Value, sourcetype="WinEventLog:Application", ResponseTime, sourcetype="WinHostMon", Duration) | stats avg(response_time) as Application_Response_Time by host | rename host as entity, Application_Response_Time as kpi_value
kpis.description: Monitors the time applications take to respond to user interactions.

kpis.base_search: `windows_index` sourcetype=WinEventLog:System EventCode=6005 OR EventCode=6006 | eval boot_time=if(EventCode=6005, _time, null()) | filldown boot_time | where isnotnull(boot_time) | streamstats window=1 current=f last(_time) as last_time by host | eval system_boot_time=boot_time-last_time | where isnotnull(system_boot_time) AND system_boot_time > 0 | stats avg(system_boot_time) as System_Boot_Time by host
kpis.description: Measures the time it takes for the system to start up and be ready for use.
kpis.kpi_base_search: `windows_index` sourcetype=WinEventLog:System EventCode=6005 OR EventCode=6006 | eval boot_time=if(EventCode=6005, _time, null()) | filldown boot_time | where isnotnull(boot_time) | streamstats window=1 current=f last(_time) as last_time by host | eval system_boot_time=boot_time-last_time | where isnotnull(system_boot_time) AND system_boot_time > 0 | stats avg(system_boot_time) as System_Boot_Time by host
